comments:
I'm using wst.server APIs to integrate BEA Weblogic Server into Eclipse. This
server recognizes BPEL components (using the WTP component framework) and is
being developed to enable deployment of BPEL module onto the server.

The server has "startBeforePublish" option set to true. This concurrent
modification exception occurs during the "Run on server" command. The server
wizard shows up and when the user hits "Finish", it attempts to start the server
and then publishes, followed by launching of the test client.

With this exception, the "Run on server" step hangs the IDE, and is a "Blocker" bug.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable
(java.util.ConcurrentModificationException)

Fix dropped to HEAD, should be able to get it in for weekly integration build.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
Verifying bug on behalf of reporter.
